parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: Detailed description of the load balancer, for easier management and identification.

parameters.name: Enabled
parameters.description:
Whether the load balancer is enabled.

- true: Enabled.
- false: Not enabled.

parameters.name: FallbackPool
parameters.description: Fallback pool ID, where traffic will be directed when all other pools are unavailable.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: Load balancer ID, which can be obtained by calling the [ListLoadBalancers](~~2868897~~) API.

parameters.name: RandomSteering
parameters.description: Weighted round-robin configuration, used to control the traffic distribution weights among different pools.

parameters.name: RegionPools
parameters.description: Address pool corresponding to the primary region.

parameters.name: Rules
parameters.description: Rule configuration list, used to define behavior overrides under specific conditions.

parameters.name: SessionAffinity
parameters.description:
Session persistence, with possible values:
- off: Not enabled.
- ip: Session persistence by IP.
- cookie: Session persistence by cookie.

parameters.name: SiteId
parameters.description: Site ID, which can be obtained by calling the [ListSites](~~ListSites~~) interface.

parameters.name: SubRegionPools
parameters.description: Address pool corresponding to the secondary region. When multiple secondary regions share the same address pool, the regions can be concatenated with commas as the key.

parameters.name: Ttl
parameters.description: TTL value, the time-to-live for DNS records, with a default of 30 and a range of 10-600.
